SEARCH
Package com.domino.app.controller

Class DominoController

java.lang.Object
com.domino.app.controller.DominoController
public class DominoController extends Object
Manages the flow of the domino game, coordinating between the model and the view.

The DominoController handles user input, game logic, and interaction with the DominoModel and DominoView. It is responsible for starting the game, managing player turns, and requesting player actions through console input.

The controller defines the main game loop, processes player actions, and updates the view accordingly. It also facilitates game configuration settings and manages the transition between different game states.
